YAY #day4 of my juice detox has been a huge success! 🎈 This morning when I woke up at 6 am I was loaded with energy and ready to rock the day. Throughout the morning and afternoon I wasn't feeling hungry at all and and I felt so focussed. Only during lunchtime, when everyone starts chewing their food, I had a bit of a grumpy moment but I'm too excited about this little journey to give up for some freshly baked bread............ (am I really?). However, I feel so creative and zen at the moment! My mind is loaded with ideas. I'm also motivated for things I would normally overthink, amazing right? I do realise my body needs a lot of rest to get the best cleansing results, so I'm gonna read my fave magazines and put on a face mask. Urgh I keep starring at this page though 🍫 #greenjuice #chocolate #kinfolk #kinfolkmagazine #cereal  #magazine #cleanse #juicecleanse #juicedetox #detox #cleansing #coldpressed #juice #raw #organic #vegan #fresh #coldpressedjuices #slowevening #veggiejuice #slowliving #zen #eatclean #healthy #healthyfood #goals #amsterdam #amsterdamfood #happy

📸👉@mariskabuiter  Does it seem like there's a food fest every weekend in Amsterdam? Well, there is. And sometimes more than one at the same time.  This weekend is Butcher's Heaven, which as you can infer from the name is all about creative vegetarian options and plant-based supplements. There will be no dead animals and fire pits. Just free yoga workshops and matcha tea. Be sure to stop by the Freedom Flush stand for a chance to get 15% off their 30-day juice cleanse program.  At the #centralemarkthal in the West. Open today and tomorrow until 23:00.  Download #sightseenapp from the App Store. Have you guys tried Mojo? It's a delicious Cuban marinade made with lashings of sour orange juice, plenty of cumin, garlic and oregano. If you don't have access to sour oranges, then no problem, use normal fresh orange's and lime juice, to achieve that tart taste. There are many variations of the recipe as there are with many recipes. You can use it on seafood, meats, it's usually used a lot with pork or chicken. Here I've used it on red snapper. If you like garlic and the tart flavours, this one is for you. Recipe on the website soon, go to www.nyamfoodie.com  By the way I'm hosting a pop up at Scrapyard Cafe on Wednesday 8th March. If the pictures on this feed make your mouth water, why don't you come and try some of my food for yourself. Dining starts at 6.30pm, if you'd like to book your spot email your reservation to wearenyam@gmail.com  Come nYam and jam!  #foodography #foodnetwork #foodpic #foodporn #foodism #foodlover #foodstagram #moderncaribbean #moderncaribbeanfood #moderncaribbeanflavors #moderncaribbeancuisine #yummy #foodinspo #amsterdam #amsterdamfood #amsterdamcity #f52gramsfoodpic #f52grams @cafescrapyard #like4like #follow4follow
Getting my greens in two different ways at Wagamama in Amsterdam. I had a veggie ramen and a juice with cucumber, pineapple, spinach, apple and lime.  #thepowerofjuice

Everything can go wrong in this day and I'll still be smiling from this heavenly breakfast 😛 Poached eggs, smoked salmon, avocado, and cottage cheese sitting atop the most delicious homemade bread. We also couldn't resist the fresh juice made with red beet, pear, and ginger. Officially my favorite breakfast and lunch spot, worth the trip to Amsterdam in itself 💚💛 @greenwoods_tearoom #greenwoods #greenwoodssingel #amsterdamfood

PLUK 💗delicious breakfast at pluk - green juice, a pluk bowl, banana bread and a beetroot latte with almond milk. Loving all these little shop cafes that have mezzanines where you eat - it's so cute! And go take a peek at the shop downstairs @annadaniels94 and me wanted to buy the entire shop - we resisted and got a few items each 😜 @plukamsterdam #plukamsterdam #breakfast #amsterdam #amsterdamfood #glutenfree #greenjuice #plukbowls #fruit #healthycafe #healthybodyhealthymind #food #sistertime #sisterbreak #minibreak #48hoursinamsterdam
